lines.text: They that say confession is good for the soul overlook the load it takes off the chest.
You seem uncommon lucky in comin' on to other folks's jewelry - leastwise so you always say.
You're a fine jeweler, Nugget, but someday if you keep talkin' so much, I'm abt to forget that.
Hmmph. I guess the only way for me to keep from swallowing a wasp is to keep my mouth shut, huh?
